Home.description: This is a biiiiig description XD If you like this type content please subscribe to my channel

Hero.heading: I am Edson Araújo, Full Stack developer.
Hero.body1: I love writing code that takes things to the next level, creating highly performant applications, automated API integrations, and creating impressive user experiences that make you feel
Hero.body2: I am always eager to learn and explore new technologies, frameworks, and programming languages. Currently, I am learning about

TwitterInfo.description: Studying and sharing knowledge; Web Development; Coffee, daily life, and a few other things.

About.description1: I am a Web Developer in Santos, São Paulo - Brazil. My focus for years has been Full Stack development
About.description4: But currently I work on projects with
About.description6: I have spent most of my life deeply interested in technology and food, continuously building things with both. As a teenager, I was a typical computer nerd, spending most of my time messing with the computer, modding games and discovering things. Tinkering with hardware, assembling computers. Developing websites with Wordpress. And of course, playing games.
About.description7: Most of that is still true today.

birth.heading: Birth
birth.description: In Guarujá, São Paulo, I was born.

games.heading: Games
games.description: My siblings and I got a Nintendo Super NES, it started my life in games, and Super Mario is still my favorite.

school.heading: School
school.description: This year I started my academic life, my first year in public school.

newGames.heading: New games
newGames.description: This year I got an upgrade in games and received a Sega Mega Drive as a gift.

firstComputerContact.heading: First contact with Computer
firstComputerContact.description: My brother got a computer, and I had my first contact with it. Of course, it was love at first sight.

computerGames.heading: Games on computer
computerGames.description: After getting used to the computer, I started playing Habbo, a famous online game of the time, spending the whole afternoon playing.

socialMedia.heading: Starting with Social Media
socialMedia.description: I created my first account on Orkut and Twitter, I loved browsing social media.

firstFlight.heading: First flight
firstFlight.description: I traveled by plane for the first time, flying to Ceará to visit my family.

firstPhone.heading: My first phone
firstPhone.description: My mom gave me my first phone for my 11th birthday, and it wasn't even touch.

firstTouchPhone.heading: My first touch phone
firstTouchPhone.description: For my birthday, I got my first touch phone.

secondCearaTrip.heading: Second trip to Ceará
secondCearaTrip.description: I traveled for the second time to spend the year-end holidays in Ceará.

middleSchoolGraduation.heading: Graduated from Middle School
middleSchoolGraduation.description: I graduated from middle school, excited for the new stage of my life.

firstJob.heading: My first job
firstJob.description: My first job at the Guarujá City Hall as an apprentice.

englishStudies.heading: Studying English
englishStudies.description: I started my English course at a language school.

technicalCourse.heading: Technical course
technicalCourse.description: I started my technical course in Business Administration at ETEC in Guarujá.

endOfEnglishCourse.heading: End of English course
endOfEnglishCourse.description: I ended the English course due to financial issues, and continued studying alone.

highSchoolGraduation.heading: Graduated from High School
highSchoolGraduation.description: I graduated from high school in December 2019.

technicalCourseGraduation.heading: Graduated from technical course
technicalCourseGraduation.description: I completed my technical course in Business Administration.

businessAdministrationCollege.heading: Business Administration College
businessAdministrationCollege.description: I started studying Business Administration in college.

covid19.heading: Covid 19
covid19.description: Due to the Covid 19 quarantine, I started working from home, and my college was remote.

firstCode.heading: First line of code
firstCode.description: I wrote my first line of code in Python: print('Hello world')

computerEngineeringCollege.heading: Computer Engineering College
computerEngineeringCollege.description: I switched courses and universities to Computer Engineering and received a 100% scholarship.

frontEndCourseCompletion.heading: Completed Front End course
frontEndCourseCompletion.description: I completed my Front End course, and became very excited about development.

javaSpringCourse.heading: Back end with Java and Spring
javaSpringCourse.description: I completed my Back end course with Java and Spring, becoming a Full Stack developer.

firstDevJob.heading: Working as a Dev
firstDevJob.description: I was hired as a Full Stack Dev to work with Java, Struts, and React.

changedCourse.heading: Changed course
changedCourse.description: I changed my course due to conflicts with the curriculum of the previous university.

movedOut.heading: Moved out
movedOut.description: I moved out of my parents' house, scared of this challenge but it was always my goal.

typescriptCourseCompletion.heading: Completed TypeScript course
typescriptCourseCompletion.description: Due to its typing, I fell in love with TypeScript and completed this course.

seriousIllness.heading: Got very sick
seriousIllness.description: I discovered an autoimmune disease, it was a complicated period but I overcame it.

laravelProjects.heading: Participated in Laravel projects
laravelProjects.description: I worked on Laravel projects, had the challenge and opportunity to work with PHP and Laravel and Tailwind in an environmental management system.

tailwindProjects.heading: Exploring Tailwind
tailwindProjects.description: I completed my Tailwind course, I love developing projects with this library.

nextjsProjects.heading: Next.js projects
nextjsProjects.description: I developed projects with Next.js, which I enjoyed working with.
